text: The U.S. Post Office in Sycamore, Illinois is listed on the National Register of Historic Places as part of the Sycamore Historic District. The district was designated and listed in May 1978. It stands directly across the street from another key structure in the district, the Sycamore Public Library and cross- corner from the district's largest structure, the DeKalb County Courthouse. It is open M-F from 8:30 am – 6:00 pm, Sat. from 9:00 am – 3:00 pm, and it is closed on Sunday. ==See also== * List of United States Post Offices == References == Sycamore, Illinois Category:Buildings and structures in Sycamore Historic District Category:Historic district contributing properties in Illinois Category:Post office buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Illinois
title: United States Post Office (Sycamore, Illinois)
